pullRequest.title: Chat filtering mappings
pullRequest.bodyText: Mapping class_5513/ChatStream is a good start as it is really easy to tell what they are called by. method_31288/checkMessage is called for Player sent messages, while method_31289/checkMessages is called for multi-line text such as signs and within writable books. It is clear that class_5516/Impl is an implementation of this which defers the request to an external HTTP server, which the outer class class_5514/ChatFilterer handles. The parameters for class_5514/ChatFilterer are obvious from the method_31302/createFilterer (String) method, which accepts the raw JSON filter config from the ServerPropertiesHandler. class_5515/HashIgnorer was a little tricky (and I'm looking for a better name) but it can be analyzed to take the hash and the total hash count, and it handles if the message should be blocked in the end.

commit.message: Map filter methods for in-game strings

nodes.bodyText: is endpoint the best name? maybe link or url? something about endpoint doesnt seam right
questionable name. maybe call it filterMessage for context?
